Filter¶

Filter a subset of channels.

Inputs

  • Raw

  • Epochs

  • Evoked

Outputs

  • Raw: Filtered Raw

  • Epochs: Filtered Epochs

  • Evoked: Filtered Evoked

Use

  1. The lower pass-band edge - Low cut-off frequency in Hz.

  2. The upper pass-band edge - High cut-off frequency in Hz.

Example¶

More information filter in Raw here. More information filter in Epochs here. More information filter in Evoked here.
